answers.answer: How long did it take to get your results nack, and what state are you in?I took mine Monday and worry about it. Sorry you failed it, but my doctor told me that half of the girls fail it,  than th eery do the three hour test and they pass it. So hopefully you will pass the three hour test
I failed my 1-hour test by only 3 points with a score of 143. Thankfully I passed the 3-hour test. I took that one on a Friday and got the results the following Wednesday.
I failed both the 1hr and 3 hr right now have to check my sugar 4 times a day and see  a dietitian we will see what happens a and what is next I'm 26 weeks will be 27 weeks on Monday

I failed my one hour, passed the following three hour barely. I'm scheduled for another three hour in two weeks. My doctor is worried about me developing gestational diabetes so I have been on a special diet since 18weeks

Look ladies with blood sugar levels those are nothing to worry about. Don't let your Dr. Scare you. As long as your sugar stays under 200 you ARE FINE. If you are pre-diabetic before pregnancy then the higher numbers such as 160-180 are reason to be concerned.

I took the test about a week before my scheduled appt. My friend did it as well and she got her results back in like 3 days.I live in NY....I read somewhere that like 80% of women who fail the one hour pass the three hour, so hopefully we have nothing to worry about! I did have a big bowl of ice cream the day before the test, so I blame it on that lol
I got mine back the very next day. I live in ky. I failed my one hour but took my three hour and threw it up in 40mins. Had to do a modified three hour and passed.

I'm confused. I had a 2 hr gestational diabetes test. The nurse said that if there is a problem then they put u on some sort of diet and if everything is ok then u hear back in a few days.... hmm guess I will wait till Friday...
I passed mine with 106! But baby is big and they might change my due date. Good luck with yall tests

question: Hey ladies. Has anyone else had a bad result with the one hour glucose test? Mine came back as 157 and I'm scheduled for the three hour test next week :(
title: Flunked my one hour glucose test :(
